definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Ashdod (As. Asdudu, COT:Gloss Dl:Pa 289; Thes MV der. fr. √ [[שׁדד]] q.v.) a powerful city of the Philistines on Mediterr. Sea, W. from Jerusalem, modern Esdûd, Jos 11:22, Jos 15:46, Jos 15:47 (where assigned to Judah) 1Sa 5:5, 1Sa 5:6 (but del. Dr cf. LXX) 1Sa 6:17 Am 1:8, Am 3:9, Zep 2:4, Zec 9:6, Is 20:1, Je 25:20, 2Ch 26:6; c. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc. 1Sa 5:1 Is 20:1; ´[[אַנְשֵׁי א]] 1Sa 5:7; appar. = territory of Ashdod 2Ch 26:6 [[וַיִּבְנֶה עָרִים בְּאַשְׁדּוֹד]]. (Cf. Survey:J, 442.)
